name: CarParkingSim
description:
This is a Simple Activity Game Mix with an Educational elements

Targeted for Kids from Age (1-to 5) years

The Full Game loop is automated but users have to push only one button to progress further in the game world

There is no Game Over Conditions for this game 

If Causal Gamers like this game (By Giving Positive feedback via comments and ratings) I may further work on this game full-fleshed 

In total there are 2 levels in this prototype explaining how to play this game with tutorial support 

there may be bugs that I never noticed in this prototype so please mercy on me XD
